NewsArticle.Title: Suomi Troupe Open House
NewsArticle.Content: Citizens of Suomi, tell your friends about our upcoming Open House! This will be an excellent opportunity for us to demonstrate to the curious aisling just why our fair community is such a great place to live. Light refreshments will be served. ((Open House will be held on June 14th 12PM PST.)) Location: Suomi Fountain -Suomi Troupe
